com.percussion.xmldom
Class PSStylesheetCacheManager

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.xmldom.PSStylesheetCacheManager

public class PSStylesheetCacheManager
extends Object

Caches stylesheets as PSCachedStylesheet in a Map keyed by URL

Method Detail

getStyleSheetFromCache

public static com.percussion.data.PSCachedStylesheet getStyleSheetFromCache(URL styleFile)
                                                                     throws PSExtensionProcessingException
get a stylesheet from the cache by URL. If the stylesheet does not exist in the cache, it will be added

Parameters:
styleFile - the URL of the stylesheet to cache.
Returns:
the cached stylesheet object
Throws:
PSExtensionProcessingException - if the file does not exist or cannot be processed.

appendErrorMessages

public static void appendErrorMessages(StringBuffer buf,
                                       ErrorListener errors)
Extract errors from an PSTransformErrorListener and append them to a StringBuffer, then clear the errors from the listener.

Parameters:
buf - where to append the strings; modified by this method; if null, return quietly.
errors - where to find the errors; if null or not our implementation, return quietly.
